Code § 1798.80(e)). ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): A name, signature, address, telephone number, employment, and bank account number, credit card number, debit card number, or any other financial information. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): A name, address, telephone number, education, employment, and employment history. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): A name, signature, SSN (see above), address, telephone number, employment, and bank account number, credit card number, debit card number, or any other financial information. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): A name, address, telephone number, or employment information.

('Category', 'Category'): Protected classification characteristics under California or federal law ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): nan ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): ZipRecruiter does not request or require you to provide protected classification characteristics. However, please carefully consider the information contained within your resume/CV and application materials to ensure that you are not providing any protected classification characteristics that are not necessary for your job application or job search. Protected classification characteristics include your age (40 years or older), race, color, ancestry, national origin, citizenship, religion or creed, marital status, medical condition, physical or mental disability, sex (including gender, gender identity, gender expression, pregnancy or childbirth and related medical conditions), sexual orientation, genetic information (including familial genetic information), and veteran or military status. Employers or hiring managers may request a veteran or military status in accordance with applicable law, and you may choose whether to submit that information with your job application on our Website. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): nan ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): nan

('Category', 'Category'): Commercial information ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): Records of products or Services purchased, obtained, or considered, or other purchasing or consuming histories or tendencies (such as details about payments to and from you), details regarding the Services that you have subscribed to or purchased, and details about your company or organization (such as contact information and website URL). ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): Records of Services obtained or considered, or other consuming histories or tendencies, and details regarding the Services that you have used. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): Records of products or Services purchased, obtained, or considered, or other purchasing or consuming histories or tendencies (such as details about payments to and from you), details regarding the Services that you have subscribed to or purchased, and details about your company or organization (such as contact information and website URL). ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): Records or details of Services considered, or other consuming histories or tendencies.

('Category', 'Category'): Internet or other similar network activity ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): Login data, search history, access dates and times, browsing history, browser type and version, device information, cookie data, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform and other technology on the devices used to access the Website, and other similar activity concerning an interaction with our Services. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): Login data, search history, access dates and times, browsing history, browser type and version, device information, cookie data, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform and other technology on the devices used to access the Website, and other similar activity concerning an interaction with our Services. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): Login data, search history, access dates and times, browsing history, browser type and version, device information, cookie data, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform and other technology on the devices used to access the Website, and other similar activity concerning an interaction with our Services. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): Access dates and times, browsing history, browser type and version, device information, cookie data, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform and other technology on the devices used to access the Website, and other similar activity concerning an interaction with our Services.

('Category', 'Category'): Geolocation data ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): Time zone setting and approximate location; latitude and longitude. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): Time zone setting and approximate location; latitude and longitude. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): Time zone setting and approximate location; latitude and longitude. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): Time zone setting and approximate location; latitude and longitude.

('Category', 'Category'): Professional or employment-related information ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): Job title and company name ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): Job searches, candidate searches, job applications, any information provided in a resume/CV or job seeker profile (including, but not limited to, executive summary, objective, current or prior work experience and education), answers to screening questions provided by employers, and job application status. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): Job title and company name ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): Job title and company name

('Category', 'Category'): Inferences drawn from other personal information to create a profile ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): Inferences used to reflect a consumer’s preferences or behavior on our Website. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): Inferences used to reflect a consumer’s preferences or behavior on our Website. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): Inferences used to reflect a consumer’s preferences or behavior on our Website. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): Inferences used to reflect a consumer’s preferences or behavior on our Website.

('Category', 'Category'): Sensitive Personal Information ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Clients'): Account log-in and password to the User’s ZipRecruiter account. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Job Seekers'): Account log-in and password to the User’s ZipRecruiter account. ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Marketplace Clients'): Account log-in and password to the User’s ZipRecruiter account; and SSN (as described above). ||| ('Examples of Specific Pieces of Personal Information We May Collect from Users', 'Website Visitors / Other'): nan
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
NOTE: ZipRecruiter has not collected any of the following categories of personal information from consumers within the last twelve (12) months:

Biometric information (such as genetic, physiological, behavioral, and biological characteristics, or activity patterns used to extract a template or other identifier or identifying information, such as, fingerprints, faceprints, and voiceprints, iris or retina scans, keystroke, gait, or other physical patterns, and sleep, health, or exercise data)
Sensory data (such as audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information)
Non-public education information, per the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (20 U.S.C. Section 1232g, 34 C.F.R. Part 99)) (such as education records directly related to a student maintained by an educational institution or party acting on its behalf, such as grades, transcripts, class lists, student schedules, student identification codes, student financial information, or student disciplinary records.
Other sensitive personal information, as defined in the CCPA, that is not otherwise identified above (for example, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have not collected precise geolocation, genetic data, or personal information concerning a consumer’s health, sex life, or sexual orientation).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We obtain the categories of personal information listed above from the following categories of sources:

Directly from you. For example, when you fill in forms, create an account, submit your resume/CV, or correspond with us by post, phone, e-mail or otherwise.
Indirectly from you. For example, through automated technologies or your interactions with us, including from observing your actions when you use our Website.
From Your Company. If your company is a Client or Marketplace Client, we may receive personal information about you from your company for purposes of setting you up with a User account on our Website.
Third Parties. We may receive personal information about you from various third parties, such as data analytics providers, data brokers (for business-related data), advertising networks, service providers, third parties you directly interact with on our Website (such as your job application status), or other third parties that you direct to disclose information to us.
In our capacity as a service provider (see Section 7 below).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Specifically, ZipRecruiter collects or uses your sensitive personal information for the following purposes:

For all Users, where we collect an account log-in and password, this information is used to permit you to access your ZipRecruiter User account, authenticate you as a User, and for other security-related purposes.
For Marketplace Clients, we will collect and use your SSN (if you provide us with a W-9 and your SSN is used as the Tax Identification Number) to make payments to you and comply with our tax and financial obligations.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We disclose your personal information when you intentionally interact with third parties and when you direct us or intentionally use ZipRecruiter to disclose your personal information in connection with the Services that we provide to you. For example:
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Pursuant to the CCPA, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we may have disclosed the following categories of personal information at your direction, depending on the information that you include in your ZipRecruiter job seeker profile, resume/CV, and/or job application materials:

Category A: Identifiers
Category B: California Customer Records personal information categories
Category C: Protected classification characteristics under California or federal law
Category F: Geolocation data
Category G: Professional or employment-related information
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
In addition, ZipRecruiter may disclose any or all of the personal information identified in the categories above to the following categories of third parties for a business purpose, depending on how you interact with our Services and/or where ZipRecruiter has an obligation to make such disclosure:

Social networks, where you interact with such parties directly.
Third party partners that are integrated into our Services, where you interact with such partners directly.
Government entities, where required by law or in order to comply with our legal or regulatory obligations.
Other third parties, where required by law or in order to protect our rights, or the rights of our customers or others.
Third parties, in connection with a merger, sale, or asset transfer.
Third parties, where you have expressly consented to the disclosure of your personal information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Your privacy is our priority, and we do not monetize your personal information by selling it to third parties.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Right to Delete\n\nThe right to request that ZipRecruiter delete your personal information that we have collected from you.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Right to Correct\n\nThe right to request that ZipRecruiter correct any inaccurate personal information that it maintains about you.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: Right to Opt-Out of Sale or Sharing\n\nThe right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your personal information to third parties.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: Right of No Retaliation\n\nThe right not to be discriminated against because you exercised any of your CCPA rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Right to Delete ||| 1: The right to request that ZipRecruiter delete your personal information that we have collected from you.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Right to Correct ||| 1: The right to request that ZipRecruiter correct any inaccurate personal information that it maintains about you.

Text: To exercise a CCPA consumer right as described above, you can use one of the self-serve tools described below, or otherwise submit a verifiable consumer request to us by emailing dsars@ziprecruiter.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, visit the Account Settings page, click “Request Data” (or click here to login and be taken directly to that page).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: If you are a Client and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com directly from the email address associated with the account.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to delete your Job Seeker account (including the personal information associated with your account), you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, visit the Account Settings page, and click “Delete Account” (or click here to login and be taken directly to that page).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: If you are a Client and would like to delete your Client account (including the personal information associated with your account), you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com directly from the email address associated with the account.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For more information, or to submit an opt-out request, you (or your authorized representative) may visit our Notice of Right to Opt-Out page or email your request to dsars@ziprecruiter.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your CCPA rights. Unless permitted by the CCPA, we will not:

Deny you goods or services.
Charge you different prices or rates for goods or services, including through granting discounts or other benefits, or imposing penalties.
Provide you a different level or quality of goods or services.
Suggest that you may receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level or quality of goods or services.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Changes to this California Privacy Notice\nWe reserve the right to change this Privacy Notice at any time. If we propose to make any material changes, we will notify you by posting a notice on the Website or by issuing an email to the email address listed by registered Users prior to the changes becoming effective, and will update the Privacy Notice’s effective date. You acknowledge that it is your responsibility to maintain a valid email address as a registered User, and to review the Website and this Privacy Notice periodically in order to be aware of any modifications. If you object to any changes to the revised Privacy Notice, you can stop using our Services and close your account with us. However, if you continue to use our Services (including the Website) after we publish a new or updated Privacy Notice, you acknowledge that such continued use means that the treatment of your personal information will be subject to the new or updated Privacy Notice.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Last Updated: June 28, 2023
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text:
NOTE: ZipRecruiter has not collected any of the following categories of personal information from consumers within the last twelve (12) months:

Biometric information (such as genetic, physiological, behavioral, and biological characteristics, or activity patterns used to extract a template or other identifier or identifying information, such as, fingerprints, faceprints, and voiceprints, iris or retina scans, keystroke, gait, or other physical patterns, and sleep, health, or exercise data)
Sensory data (such as audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information)
Non-public education information, per the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (20 U.S.C. Section 1232g, 34 C.F.R. Part 99)) (such as education records directly related to a student maintained by an educational institution or party acting on its behalf, such as grades, transcripts, class lists, student schedules, student identification codes, student financial information, or student disciplinary records.
Other sensitive personal information, as defined in the CCPA, that is not otherwise identified above (for example, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have not collected precise geolocation, genetic data, or personal information concerning a consumer’s health, sex life, or sexual orientation).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Sources of Personal Information
We obtain the categories of personal information listed above from the following categories of sources:

Directly from you. For example, when you fill in forms, create an account, submit your resume/CV, or correspond with us by post, phone, e-mail or otherwise.
Indirectly from you. For example, through automated technologies or your interactions with us, including from observing your actions when you use our Website.
From Your Company. If your company is a Client or Marketplace Client, we may receive personal information about you from your company for purposes of setting you up with a User account on our Website.
Third Parties. We may receive personal information about you from various third parties, such as data analytics providers, data brokers (for business-related data), advertising networks, service providers, third parties you directly interact with on our Website (such as your job application status), or other third parties that you direct to disclose information to us.
In our capacity as a service provider (see Section 7 below).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
ZipRecruiter may collect or use your sensitive personal information only as necessary to perform the Services or provide the goods reasonably expected by an average consumer, or as otherwise permitted by the CCPA. Specifically, ZipRecruiter collects or uses your sensitive personal information for the following purposes:

For all Users, where we collect an account log-in and password, this information is used to permit you to access your ZipRecruiter User account, authenticate you as a User, and for other security-related purposes.
For Marketplace Clients, we will collect and use your SSN (if you provide us with a W-9 and your SSN is used as the Tax Identification Number) to make payments to you and comply with our tax and financial obligations.
ZipRecruiter will not collect additional categories of personal information or use the personal information we collected for materially different, unrelated, or incompatible purposes without providing you notice.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
How We Disclose Your Personal Information
A. Disclosures of Personal Information at Your Direction
We disclose your personal information when you intentionally interact with third parties and when you direct us or intentionally use ZipRecruiter to disclose your personal information in connection with the Services that we provide to you. For example:

If you are a Job Seeker and apply to a job posting on our Website or choose to connect with a specific employer, we will disclose your personal information to that prospective employer and/or its agent or representative (including but not limited to, external Applicant Tracking Systems or any other external systems used by the direct employer to manage the hiring of employees or other categories of workers). If you are a Job Seeker and you are opted-in to our Resume Database, we will disclose your personal information to prospective employers and/or their agents or representatives that have access to the Resume Database. We will also disclose your personal information at your direction for any other purpose as specified on the Website or within the Services, provided you agree to such disclosure.
If you are a Client, and you invite candidates to apply, or request that ZipRecruiter assist in helping to invite candidates to apply to or interview for your job advertisement, we will disclose your personal information with the prospective candidate to invite them to apply or interview with you. We will also disclose your personal information at your direction for any other purpose as specified on the Website or within the Services, provided you agree to such disclosure.
Pursuant to the CCPA, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we may have disclosed the following categories of personal information at your direction, depending on the information that you include in your ZipRecruiter job seeker profile, resume/CV, and/or job application materials:

Category A: Identifiers
Category B: California Customer Records personal information categories
Category C: Protected classification characteristics under California or federal law
Category F: Geolocation data
Category G: Professional or employment-related information
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Your privacy is our priority, and we do not monetize your personal information by selling it to third parties.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: After you visit our Website and/or use our Services, you may receive targeted advertisements about ZipRecruiter when you visit other websites (i.e., social media sites, search engines or other websites that are unrelated to ZipRecruiter) (collectively, “Other Websites”). This happens because we use third-party vendors to provide you with information about our Services based upon your interactions with our Website. We also may place third-party cookies and other tracking technologies on our Website to track your interactions with ZipRecruiter ads placed on Other Websites.\n\nThese third-party vendors may additionally collect certain personal information about you through cookies and other tracking technologies (see our Cookie Policy for more information). These third-party vendors may work with additional downstream providers in their relationship network that assist the third-party vendor in providing the advertising services to us. When personal information is disclosed by ZipRecruiter in the manner described above, it may constitute a “sale” or “sharing” of personal information under the CCPA.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: These third-party vendors may additionally collect certain personal information about you through cookies and other tracking technologies (see our Cookie Policy for more information). These third-party vendors may work with additional downstream providers in their relationship network that assist the third-party vendor in providing the advertising services to us. When personal information is disclosed by ZipRecruiter in the manner described above, it may constitute a “sale” or “sharing” of personal information under the CCPA.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Right to Delete\n\nThe right to request that ZipRecruiter delete your personal information that we have collected from you.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Right to Correct\n\nThe right to request that ZipRecruiter correct any inaccurate personal information that it maintains about you.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: Right to Opt-Out of Sale or Sharing\n\nThe right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your personal information to third parties.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: Right of No Retaliation\n\nThe right not to be discriminated against because you exercised any of your CCPA rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: To exercise a CCPA consumer right as described above, you can use one of the self-serve tools described below, or otherwise submit a verifiable consumer request to us by emailing dsars@ziprecruiter.com. Additional details are provided below.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
Correcting Inaccurate Information
For Job Seeker Accounts: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected “Job Seeker” account on the Website, and review or update your information in the “Profile” tab.

For Client Accounts: If you are a Client and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected “Employer” account on the Website, navigate to the “My Account” drop down (in the upper right corner), click on your name and then “My Profile”, and review or update your information.

For Marketplace Client Accounts: If you are a Marketplace Client with an account in our Marketplace Services, and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, and navigate to the “Edit User Profile” (to update your name, phone number or password), or the “Credit Card” tab (to add or change the credit card information on file).

For Affiliated Sites: If you are a User of one of our Affiliated Sites and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Affiliate Site (where applicable), and review or update your profile information.

Send Us an Email With Your Request: For personal information that cannot be corrected through the self-serve tools noted above, you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com. To submit a verifiable consumer request via email, you must email us from the email address that is associated with your User Account, and identify what personal information we maintain that is inaccurate and which you are unable to correct.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Accessing Your Personal Information\nFor Job Seeker Accounts: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, visit the Account Settings page, click “Request Data” (or click here to login and be taken directly to that page).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Client Accounts: If you are a Client and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com directly from the email address associated with the account.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Affiliated Sites: If you are a User of one of our Affiliated Sites and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Affiliate Site (where applicable), and visit the user settings page.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Send Us an Email With Your Request: You may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com if you would like to access a copy of your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Job Seeker Accounts: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to delete your Job Seeker account (including the personal information associated with your account), you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, visit the Account Settings page, and click “Delete Account” (or click here to login and be taken directly to that page).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Client Accounts: If you are a Client and would like to delete your Client account (including the personal information associated with your account), you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com directly from the email address associated with the account.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Affiliated Sites: If you are a User of one of our Affiliated Sites and would like to delete your account, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Affiliate Site (where applicable), and visit the user settings page.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Send Us an Email with Your Request: All Users may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com with their deletion request.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For ZipRecruiter.com Users: For more information, or to submit an opt-out request, you (or your authorized representative) may visit our Notice of Right to Opt-Out page or email your request to dsars@ziprecruiter.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Users of an Affiliated Site: For more information, or to submit an opt-out request, you (or your authorized representative) may visit the applicable Notice of Right to Opt-Out page linked from our Affiliated Sites page or email your request to dsars@ziprecruiter.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For All Users: You may also use an opt-out preference signal, such as the Global Privacy Control (GPC), to opt-out of the sale and sharing of your personal information in accordance with the CPRA. If you use the GPC, your request to opt-out of the sale and sharing will be linked to your browser identifier only. It will not be linked to your email address (where applicable).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
Non-Discrimination
We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your CCPA rights. Unless permitted by the CCPA, we will not:

Deny you goods or services.
Charge you different prices or rates for goods or services, including through granting discounts or other benefits, or imposing penalties.
Provide you a different level or quality of goods or services.
Suggest that you may receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level or quality of goods or services.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Changes to this California Privacy Notice\nWe reserve the right to change this Privacy Notice at any time. If we propose to make any material changes, we will notify you by posting a notice on the Website or by issuing an email to the email address listed by registered Users prior to the changes becoming effective, and will update the Privacy Notice’s effective date. You acknowledge that it is your responsibility to maintain a valid email address as a registered User, and to review the Website and this Privacy Notice periodically in order to be aware of any modifications. If you object to any changes to the revised Privacy Notice, you can stop using our Services and close your account with us. However, if you continue to use our Services (including the Website) after we publish a new or updated Privacy Notice, you acknowledge that such continued use means that the treatment of your personal information will be subject to the new or updated Privacy Notice.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

NOTE: ZipRecruiter has not collected any of the following categories of personal information from consumers within the last twelve (12) months:

Biometric information (such as genetic, physiological, behavioral, and biological characteristics, or activity patterns used to extract a template or other identifier or identifying information, such as, fingerprints, faceprints, and voiceprints, iris or retina scans, keystroke, gait, or other physical patterns, and sleep, health, or exercise data)
Sensory data (such as audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information)
Non-public education information, per the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (20 U.S.C. Section 1232g, 34 C.F.R. Part 99)) (such as education records directly related to a student maintained by an educational institution or party acting on its behalf, such as grades, transcripts, class lists, student schedules, student identification codes, student financial information, or student disciplinary records.
Other sensitive personal information, as defined in the CCPA, that is not otherwise identified above (for example, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we have not collected precise geolocation, genetic data, or personal information concerning a consumer’s health, sex life, or sexual orientation).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Sources of Personal Information
We obtain the categories of personal information listed above from the following categories of sources:

Directly from you. For example, when you fill in forms, create an account, submit your resume/CV, or correspond with us by post, phone, e-mail or otherwise.
Indirectly from you. For example, through automated technologies or your interactions with us, including from observing your actions when you use our Website.
From Your Company. If your company is a Client or Marketplace Client, we may receive personal information about you from your company for purposes of setting you up with a User account on our Website.
Third Parties. We may receive personal information about you from various third parties, such as data analytics providers, data brokers (for business-related data), advertising networks, service providers, third parties you directly interact with on our Website (such as your job application status), or other third parties that you direct to disclose information to us.
In our capacity as a service provider (see Section 7 below).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
How We Disclose Your Personal Information
A. Disclosures of Personal Information at Your Direction
We disclose your personal information when you intentionally interact with third parties and when you direct us or intentionally use ZipRecruiter to disclose your personal information in connection with the Services that we provide to you. For example:

If you are a Job Seeker and apply to a job posting on our Website or choose to connect with a specific employer, we will disclose your personal information to that prospective employer and/or its agent or representative (including but not limited to, external Applicant Tracking Systems or any other external systems used by the direct employer to manage the hiring of employees or other categories of workers). If you are a Job Seeker and you are opted-in to our Resume Database, we will disclose your personal information to prospective employers and/or their agents or representatives that have access to the Resume Database. We will also disclose your personal information at your direction for any other purpose as specified on the Website or within the Services, provided you agree to such disclosure.
If you are a Client, and you invite candidates to apply, or request that ZipRecruiter assist in helping to invite candidates to apply to or interview for your job advertisement, we will disclose your personal information with the prospective candidate to invite them to apply or interview with you. We will also disclose your personal information at your direction for any other purpose as specified on the Website or within the Services, provided you agree to such disclosure.
Pursuant to the CCPA, in the preceding twelve (12) months, we may have disclosed the following categories of personal information at your direction, depending on the information that you include in your ZipRecruiter job seeker profile, resume/CV, and/or job application materials:

Category A: Identifiers
Category B: California Customer Records personal information categories
Category C: Protected classification characteristics under California or federal law
Category F: Geolocation data
Category G: Professional or employment-related information
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
In addition, ZipRecruiter may disclose any or all of the personal information identified in the categories above to the following categories of third parties for a business purpose, depending on how you interact with our Services and/or where ZipRecruiter has an obligation to make such disclosure:

Social networks, where you interact with such parties directly.
Third party partners that are integrated into our Services, where you interact with such partners directly.
Government entities, where required by law or in order to comply with our legal or regulatory obligations.
Other third parties, where required by law or in order to protect our rights, or the rights of our customers or others.
Third parties, in connection with a merger, sale, or asset transfer.
Third parties, where you have expressly consented to the disclosure of your personal information.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Sale or Sharing of Personal Information\nYour privacy is our priority, and we do not monetize your personal information by selling it to third parties.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Right to Delete\n\nThe right to request that ZipRecruiter delete your personal information that we have collected from you.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Right to Correct\n\nThe right to request that ZipRecruiter correct any inaccurate personal information that it maintains about you.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: Right to Opt-Out of Sale or Sharing\n\nThe right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your personal information to third parties.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: Right of No Retaliation\n\nThe right not to be discriminated against because you exercised any of your CCPA rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: To exercise a CCPA consumer right as described above, you can use one of the self-serve tools described below, or otherwise submit a verifiable consumer request to us by emailing dsars@ziprecruiter.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
or Job Seeker Accounts: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected “Job Seeker” account on the Website, and review or update your information in the “Profile” tab.

For Client Accounts: If you are a Client and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected “Employer” account on the Website, navigate to the “My Account” drop down (in the upper right corner), click on your name and then “My Profile”, and review or update your information.

For Marketplace Client Accounts: If you are a Marketplace Client with an account in our Marketplace Services, and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, and navigate to the “Edit User Profile” (to update your name, phone number or password), or the “Credit Card” tab (to add or change the credit card information on file).

For Affiliated Sites: If you are a User of one of our Affiliated Sites and would like to correct any inaccurate personal information we hold about you, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Affiliate Site (where applicable), and review or update your profile information.

Send Us an Email With Your Request: For personal information that cannot be corrected through the self-serve tools noted above, you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com. To submit a verifiable consumer request via email, you must email us from the email address that is associated with your User Account, and identify what personal information we maintain that is inaccurate and which you are unable to correct.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Job Seeker Accounts: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to delete your Job Seeker account (including the personal information associated with your account), you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, visit the Account Settings page, and click “Delete Account” (or click here to login and be taken directly to that page).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Client Accounts: If you are a Client and would like to delete your Client account (including the personal information associated with your account), you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com directly from the email address associated with the account. Once we receive and process the request, you will receive an automated email from us that includes a unique code that you will need to enter into your Client account to verify your identity and confirm your account deletion request.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Job Seeker Accounts: If you are a Job Seeker and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Website, visit the Account Settings page, click “Request Data” (or click here to login and be taken directly to that page).
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Client Accounts: If you are a Client and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com directly from the email address associated with the account.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Affiliated Sites: If you are a User of one of our Affiliated Sites and would like to access your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Affiliate Site (where applicable), and visit the user settings page.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Send Us an Email With Your Request: You may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com if you would like to access a copy of your personal information or obtain a copy of your personal information in a portable manner.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Affiliated Sites: If you are a User of one of our Affiliated Sites and would like to delete your account, you may log in to your password-protected account on the Affiliate Site (where applicable), and visit the user settings page.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Send Us an Email with Your Request: All Users may send an email to dsars@ziprecruiter.com with their deletion request.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For ZipRecruiter.com Users: For more information, or to submit an opt-out request, you (or your authorized representative) may visit our Notice of Right to Opt-Out page or email your request to dsars@ziprecruiter.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: For Users of an Affiliated Site: For more information, or to submit an opt-out request, you (or your authorized representative) may visit the applicable Notice of Right to Opt-Out page linked from our Affiliated Sites page or email your request to dsars@ziprecruiter.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: If you are an authorized agent, you may make a request by emailing dsars@ziprecruiter.com and providing documentation or other proof indicating that you are authorized by the consumer to act on their behalf.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
Non-Discrimination
We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your CCPA rights. Unless permitted by the CCPA, we will not:

Deny you goods or services.
Charge you different prices or rates for goods or services, including through granting discounts or other benefits, or imposing penalties.
Provide you a different level or quality of goods or services.
Suggest that you may receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level or quality of goods or services.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text:
Retention of Personal Information
Different retention periods apply for different types and categories of personal information. Table 5 below identifies the criteria used to determine the length of time ZipRecruiter intends to retain each category of personal information. Once you request that we delete your personal information, we will do so except where we are otherwise permitted or required to retain that information in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.

Table 5 - Retention Criteria
Categories of Personal Information

Criteria Used to Determine the Applicable Retention Period

Identifiers (e.g., name, alias, postal address, email address, telephone number, social media profile, social media address, username, unique personal identifier, online identifier, IP address, device IDs, account name, other similar identifiers, and SSN)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.


If you request to receive no further contact from us, we will keep some basic information about you on our suppression list in order to avoid sending you unwanted materials in the future.

Personal information categories listed in Cal. Civ. Code § 1798.80(e) (e.g., name, signature, SSN, address, telephone number, employment, and bank account number, credit card number, debit card number, or any other financial information)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.


If you request to receive no further contact from us, we will keep some basic information about you on our suppression list in order to avoid sending you unwanted materials in the future.

Protected classification characteristics (e.g., age, race, color, sex, sexual orientation, etc. that you choose to provide in your job application)

As explained above, ZipRecruiter does not request or require you to provide protected classification characteristics. However, if you provide any protected classification characteristics to ZipRecruiter when using our Services, we will retain that information to comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.

Commercial information (e.g., records of products or services purchased, obtained, or considered, or other purchasing or consuming histories or tendencies (such as details about payments to and from you), details regarding the services that you have subscribed to or purchased, and details about your company or organization)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.

Internet or other similar network activity (e.g., login data, search history, access dates and times, browsing history, browser type and version, device information, cookie data, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform and other technology on the devices used to access the Website, and other similar activity concerning an interaction with our Services)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.

Geolocation data (e.g., time zone setting and approximate location; latitude and longitude)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.

Professional or employment-related information (e.g., job searches, candidate searches, job applications, any information provided in a resume/CV or job seeker profile (including, but not limited to, executive summary, objective, current or prior work experience and education), answers to screening questions provided by employers, and job application status)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.

Inferences drawn from other personal information to create a profile (e.g., inferences used to reflect a User’s preferences or behavior on our Website)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.

Sensitive Personal Information (e.g., account log-in and password to the User’s ZipRecruiter account; and SSN)

To comply with our legal obligations under applicable law; to provide our Services to you or the time period that a User decides to keep their account open; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of fraud prevention, security, or to otherwise help ensure the integrity of the Services; the time that ZipRecruiter uses the data in furtherance of establishing or defending a legal, regulatory, or law enforcement claim or investigation; and/or for any other permitted purpose under the CCPA.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Changes to this California Privacy Notice\nWe reserve the right to change this Privacy Notice at any time. If we propose to make any material changes, we will notify you by posting a notice on the Website or by issuing an email to the email address listed by registered Users prior to the changes becoming effective, and will update the Privacy Notice’s effective date.
